body_html: I'm seeing extreme slowdown for 3D convolutions on CPU as well. I'm going through Keras Conv3D, but I suspect it's the same issue. Is there any workaround identified for this for the time being?
body_text: I'm seeing extreme slowdown for 3D convolutions on CPU as well. I'm going through Keras Conv3D, but I suspect it's the same issue. Is there any workaround identified for this for the time being?
body: I'm seeing extreme slowdown for 3D convolutions on CPU as well. I'm going through Keras `Conv3D`, but I suspect it's the same issue. Is there any workaround identified for this for the time being?
